DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of coronary artery vessel wall healing at different time points in patients undergoing implantion of bioresorbable vascular scaffold by using intravascular imaging
DOC.detailed_description: OCT-guided evalutation of the coronary vessel wall, endovascular healing and bioresorbable vascular scaffolds at different time points. These results will be analysed in terms of clinical presentation, gender and age.
DOC.criteria: optical coherence tomography examination after BVSimplantation
